peopleAlsoAsk.question: What is the revenue of JD com in 2023?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet:
For the full year of 2023, JD.com reported net revenues of RMB1,084.7 billion (US$152.8 billion), representing a 3.7% increase from the full year of 2022. Net product revenues increased by 0.7%, while net service revenues increased by 17.8% for the full year of 2023, as compared to the full year of 2022.

peopleAlsoAsk.question: What is the revenue trend of JD com?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: JD.com had revenue of 291.40B CNY in the quarter ending June 30, 2024, with 1.20% growth. This brings the company's revenue in the last twelve months to 1.11T, up 3.30% year-over-year. In the year 2023, JD.com had annual revenue of 1.08T with 3.67% growth.

peopleAlsoAsk.question: What is the net revenue of JD com?
